fullplot: Ann, 23 years old, lives a modest life with her two kids and her husband in a trailer in her mother's garden. Her life takes a dramatic turn, when her doctor tells her that she has uterine cancer and only two months to live. She compiles a list of things to do before she dies.
plot: A young woman conceals the fact of her terminal cancer to live her life with a passion she never had before.
title: My Life Without Me
